title: Free Valentine
description: Free Valentine is the second installment of 'The Valentine Series', equally as hot its predecessor. Rose and James, the former bickering step-siblings, have landed in unknown territory. After letting their desires run rampant, they must face the real world and the real consequences of their actions.The lovers have explored each other’s bodies to satiety, but exploring their feelings is not nearly as simple. Fresh wounds, old habits and new expectations. Can two people compromise who they’ve always been to become what the other needs?If you love something, set it free?Reader discretion is advised.
author: Stephanie Amaral
